summary.span: 包含可用于代码字符串以有助于防止应用程序遭到站点式脚本 (XSS） 的攻击和 LDAP 注入式攻击的方法。

span.span: Contains methods that you can use to encode strings in order help you protect your application against cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and LDAP injection attacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码的算法查找规定的一组字符被视为安全，并将所有其他字符编码。The encoding algorithms look for a prescribed set of characters that are considered safe and encode all other characters. （这有时称为"安全列表"或"白名单。"）(This is sometimes referred to as "safe-listing" or "whitelisting.")
